title: Facet counts over non-linear date intervals
description:
Hi All,

How can I generate  facet counts over non-linear date intervals, for instance obtaining results from: "Last 7 days", "Last 30 days", "Last 90 days", "Last 6 months" ... ?

I have tried everything mentioned in the docs but could not accomplish the above. Using Solr 1.2 with PhpSolrClient on PHP 5.25.

Please help...

TIA

comments.content:
Please use the solr-user list for usage questions.

Give fact.query a try using range queries, though
